name: Operator! Telephone Operator Simulator 2015
description:
"Operators didn't just connect people's calls, they connected with people. Angry people. Frightened people. Friendly people. Sometimes, people who got too friendly." —George Kupczak

Made for the STL Scatterjam 2015: Theme: Connections

And, the Indie Speed Run 2015: Theme: Repair, Element: Calculator

** Note: this game was started, and finished in under 48 hours, so there are a couple of (small) bugs...

"Morning Mood (by Grieg)" by Edvard Grieg, from YouTube Audio Library.

Prologue narration by George Kupczak of the AT&T Archives and History Center, from the introduction to the film Operator (1969; introduction 2012).

Eine kleine Nachtmusik by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart (performance by Advent Chamber Orchestra), licensed under CC BY-SA 2.0. Additional music by Gustav Holst (performance by The United States Air Force Band).

Sound effects: plugging in a plug.aif by gpenn76 and Plug IN by unfa, both licensed under CC BY 3.0 / mixed, and mixed and reversed; SITs4.wav by kwahmah_02, licensed under CC BY 3.0 / frequency and length modified. Additional sound effects by esperri, ihitokage, Kenney, and ramicio.
